item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Google Analytics This site uses Google Analytics to analyze access data. Google Analytics collects some information using Cookie or a unique identifier. For more details, see How Google uses information from sites or apps that use our services. Microsoft Clarity This site uses Microsoft Clarity to analyze activity. Microsoft Clarity collects some information like the place where you clicked. For more details, see Microsoft Privacy Statement.

item.title: About
item.description: This site is Akimo(@akimon658)’s blog. I’ll write about Pokémon and tech. About Me I’m a Pokémon Trainer and love Google and BUMP OF CHICKEN. I’m learning English, so I’m happy if you make a comment or give me some advice.
